channel.title: ~DavidScape [508]~ Development ~ OVER 2K VIEWS
channel.description:
Ok, before I begin, just so theres no complaints, this WAS a Bulby source, so credit to him. However, I have edited a LOT, so Id probably make it like this: Bulby, Me, [url=http://itemdb.co.nr]itemdb.co.nr[/url] & [url=http://Moparscape.org/smf]Moparscape.org/smf[/url]
[b]NEW EDITS:[/b] [b]-ALL NEW! I FIGURED OUT HOW TO MAKE A 508 LD SERVER TURN HD! THIS SERVER IS NOW HD! [size=15pt]-ADDED [u]WORKING[/u] TRADING!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!! -FIXED RANGE ON NPCS![/size] -CAN NO LONGER CLAIM ARROWS FROM RANGE TUTOR! HAVE TO MAKE WITH FLETCHING!! -YOU CAN PLAY HD OR LD! BOTH WORK! AT SAME TIME!! -ADDED [u]WORKING[/u] IpBAN & BAN COMMANDS! NEVER SEEN (working) IN BULBY BASE!! -FIXED ANCIENTS AND ADDED ALTAR AT HOME!!! -TRAINING AREA CHANGES DEPENDING ON LEVEL! -FIXED CHAT LOGS! (Bulby base had messed up logs) -ADDED MEMBERSHIP AND MEMBER SHOP! -ADDED/FIXED ANCIENTS! -ADDED EASY (Quest Tab) TELES! [/b]
Here are a few things:
All 24 skills work!!! (Includes Summoning, Construction, and Hunter!) (NEW means it wasnt in the Bulby base)
-STAFF ZONE ON GE ROOF!NEW -All 24 skill-cape emotes work 100%!!! -All 24 Skills work and level! -Clan Chat -Trading! -Get third age by winning in fight pits! -Real Castle Wars & Clan Wars! -Perfect Dueling!! -Fight pits!!! [b]-A new verifing code stops Autos from spamming![/b] NEW -Dragon Slayer -Jad drops Fire Cape!! NEW -Pets follow you! -Admin Pets! NEW -Summoning NPCS Follow you! -ALL NEW GWD WITH KILLCOUNT NEVER BEFORE SEEN IN BULBY BASE!!! (PICS SOON) NEW -GWD Bosses drop hilts and godsword blades! NEW -Use a hilt with blade to get a godsword! NEW -All GS specs work! -All Barrows Specs Work! -Wildy Levels Work! NEW -Wildy ditch jumping! NEW -Fight Caves & Pits! Winner gets 3rd age piece! -HD!!! NEW -CHAT LOGS!! NEW -ANCIENTS!NEW -MEMBERSHIP!NEW -When u equip ancient staff, u turn ancients! NEW [center]
ADMIN COMMANDS
::givemember #### - gives #### membership NEW ::removemember #### - removes #### membership NEW ::staff - teles to staff zone NEW ::pnpc #### -changes you into a monster (npc) NEW ::unpc -changes you back to normal NEW ::mute #### -mutes a player(####) NEW ::unmute #### -obvious... NEW ::kick #### -dcs the person for a second ::master - all 99's ::slave - all 98's ::capes2 -gives all skillcapes into your invintory (DONT FORGET THE 2!) ::hoods -all skillcape hoods ::bh -teleport to bounty hunter ::cw - tele to castle wars ::range -gives a whip ::food -full invintory of monkfish ::pouches -gives one of every pouch ::fullkc -kives a killcount of 200 for every GWD boss area.. (do ::gwd to get there) NEW ::emote #### -does the emote number.... there are like 500 ::gfx #### -does a special effect... there are like thousands of these.. ::npc ### -spawns a certain npc.. over 10k of these.. ::tele @@@@ #### $ -teles to a specific location (@@@@ = x, #### = y, $ = height of location ::god -kool special effect an makes u fly NEW ::godoff -turns god off NEW ::coords -gets you coords... ex : X = 4353, Y = 3123 ::teletome #### -teleport the person to you ::private -teles you to a private place NEW ::teleto #### -teles you to specific person ::di NAME ITEMID ITEMAMT - Deletes a certain number(itemamt) of a specific item(itemid) from a specific persons invintory(name). NEW!!! ~~NEVER BEFORE SEEN IN ANY PRIVATE SERVER~~ ::rs - Fills the special energy bar (restore special) NEW ::ban ### - bans the user ### (CANNOT BE UNDONE!!!) NEW ::ipban ### - ipbans the user ### it creates a file in a folder, which the server checks every time the person loggs in. If the file is there, they are still banned. To un-ban, delete the file) NEW
NORMAL COMMANDS
::verifycode #### - Verify your acc, allowing you to use commands (#### is your code) NEW ::kc - see your killcount of each god in the GWD NEW ::suggestion BLAHBLAH - Gives me a suggestion to add to server (blahblah is the suggestion) ::reportbug BLAHBLAH- report a game buh ::reportabuse NAME REASON- report someone breaking the rules ::wildy - tele to wildy for pking ::gwd - tele to godwars NEW ::fixgwd - if u go underground in the god wars dungeon, use this to go back up NEW ::pm NAME MESSAGE_LIKE_THIS - private message someone. There name is NAME, and you message needs to have _ instead of spaces. Like this ::pm david Hey_whats_up!_Want_to_talk? NEW ::goinhouse NAME - go inside someones house ::whereis NAME - find out where someone is ::savebackup - save a backup in case u get reset. DO THIS EVERY TIME U LOG OUT! ::loadbackup - loads a backup. ONLY IF U SAVED ONE! ::yell MESSAGE - makes a message everyone can hear ::newroom - in construction, makes a new room ::deleteroom - easy.. ::help - see a few commands ::home - teles home to the GE ::players - see who's online ::char - change your character male/female NEW
VID: [img]http://f.imagehost.org/dl/730a5f9021a094fb43ffa7bb80b25a71/0134/KillJadDSGif.gif[/img]
PICS: DSLAYER Quest [img]http://i36.tinypic.com/2ivjxfp.png[/img] Fight Caves! [img]http://i36.tinypic.com/15gxjbp.png[/img] Farming [img]http://img367.imageshack.us/img367/9320/farmingra5.png[/img] Slayer [img]http://img114.imageshack.us/img114/7969/slayerso5.png[/img] [b]BANDOS LAIR!!!![/b] [img]http://img404.imageshack.us/img404/7904/bandosreward.png[/img]
All of the GWD bosses are they're, and none of this is leeched (if you can find a single 508 server that has ALL of this, I will remove this post.)
